subject: Re: Lanna Rehab
preview: Hi William, We have been working with the alcoholrehab.com site. The contact us form is now loading, it was a conflict with some geolocation scripts they are running, which identify the location of t

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi William, 

We have been working with the alcoholrehab.com site. The contact us form is now loading, it was a conflict with some geolocation scripts they are running, which identify the location of the visitor and then load the most appropriate phone number in the header of the site. 

E.g. we should see the AU toll free number.

We have disabled those scripts so the contact form loads, whilst we figure out a workaround. I'll keep you updated.

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. I'm not expecting you to respond after-hours... but I do appreciate that you are being super supportive.

May I please add this to your list tomorrow: Alcohol Rehab is loading very slow. On mobile, it stopped loading even when it's not completely loaded. The Ninja Form on Contact Us page also loads very slowly.

Thanks Heath.

Kind Regards,


William Yap
Senior Marketing Manager
P: 1300 660 285 · M: 0401 771 320
50 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060


Virus-free. www.avg.com

> On Thu, 22 Aug 2019 at 21:49, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com> wrote:
> Hi William,
>
> Sure, it looks like a bug with Ninja Forms.
>
> The form in the footer at the bottom of the page was previously a CF7 one, we changed it to the Ninja Forms one as requested earlier. Now that it’s a Ninja Form, the two captcha’s are technically serving the same purpose of protecting the same form... so they are conflicting with each other.
>
> We will try and create a work around for you. Leave it with me.
>
> Thanks and speak soon,
> Heath Maguire
> Director
>
> E. heath@wpperk.com | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
>
>
>
>
